quizzes.title: Tech Quiz
quizzes.desc:
Put your knowledge about all things technology to the test with our 5 question quiz and have some nerdy fun in the process.

Because everything tech, from computers and the internet to software and big data, changes rapidly on a day-to-day basis, it’s now a must to stay up to date with the technology that dominates our modern day lives.

questions.title: Which of the companies manufacture chips
Number of bits used in IPV6 address
Which is the first search Engine in the world
.MOV' extension refers usually to what kind of file?

quizzes.title: India Quiz
quizzes.desc: GK Questions and Answers on India and its States: Explore a few MCQs on India and its states and enhance your knowledge. This will arouse your interest and also help in the preparation of various competitive examinations, including UPSC, State PCS, IBPS, SBI, SCC, Railways, etc
